channel.title: Story on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in Story on Yaya's World

item.title: 2. A New Life in Trollskull Alley
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: While I can almost guarantee that the important details were all there, looking through my entry on how I met Ember and Tracie, I know there was much that was left out. To this end I have decided that I should begin to keep a daily journal of all of my actions. Even those that may be seen as mundane. I apologize for the somewhat rushed and lax presentation of my last adventures.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: The Ultimate Yolk
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: The year is 2021, the month is November, and the setting is the game we all know and love: Fiesta Online. An idea hatched to create a character by the name of _Egg.
item.dc:creator: michelle.bsparkx

item.title: Chapter 1: Where's My Baby!?
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: While on an ADVENTURE with Yayoi, Baby ended up chasing a sheep. After, finally, catching up to the sheep, Baby gave it a nice pet. It was so fluffy and soft, she couldn't resist. She looked around and found that she was no longer with Yayoi. In fact, Yayoi was no where to be seen. Fortunately a party of friends was out on an ADVENTURE of their own and found her, now in Burning Hill, by herself.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
